sentences: Ta on nii õnnele, et ta alati lennuvad.
Mõned linnud ei oska isegi lentama.
Tihti peetakse jahutajaid kodus, et nad ei saaks lendama.
context: 'lendavad' refers to the action of flying or gliding through air. It is commonly used for birds and aircrafts but can also be metaphorically applied to describe something that moves quickly or easily.
